title: Was Captain Kangru and Lee Marvin fighting in Ew Gemma?
subtitle: Lee Marvin and Bob, Captain Kangru, Kishan, were in the army during World War II, but they didn't fight together in Iwo Gemma or any other clash.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Lee Marvin, actor, Bob Kishan, "Captain Kangru" on television were the veterans of the Second World War who fought together in Io Gemma.
